p: According to the International Olive Council standards for sensory evaluation, the classification of oils in categories such as “extra virgin”, “virgin” or “lampante” is based on the evaluation of both ‘negative’ and ‘positive’ attributes ( International Olive Council, 2005, 2011). Among the positive sensory attributes, fruity notes should be identified in the EVOO, whereas negative ones (sensory defects) cannot be present.
